label: 1/288 twist = sole baryon asymmetry
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Chiral orthogonality: 1/288 twist creates baryon asymmetry
# Single root twist breaks matter/antimatter symmetry
# Zero twist would lead to complete annihilation

chiral_twist = 1 / ROOTS  # 1/288 = 0.00347...
baryon_asymmetry = chiral_twist

# Validation: Non-zero twist prevents annihilation
assert chiral_twist > 0
assert abs(chiral_twist - 1/288) < 1e-10
note: 1/288 chiral twist is sole source of baryon asymmetry; zero twist would cause annihilation
